DOC.brief_summary: Helicobacter pylori eradication (H. pylori) rates with clarithromycin-based triple therapy are declining, and an alternative strategy is needed urgently. The investigators sought to compare the efficacy of pretreatment antimicrobial susceptibility-guided vs. clarithromycin-based triple therapy vs. concomitant therapy for H. pylori eradication in a region with high rates of multiple drug resistance.
DOC.brief_title: Development of Treatment Algorithm for Eradication of Helicobacter Pylori Based on Antibiotic Susceptibility Test
DOC.criteria: 1. positive results of rapid urease test 1. liver cirrhosis, 2. chronic kidney disease, 3. bleeding tendency, 4. pregnant, 5. allergy to antibiotics
